name: The Pink Dread
description:
Blast them sheep to pieces and become the fiercest dragon-pig of all the realms!

How to Play
  • Press SPACE to JUMP
  • Emit a FIREBOLT with your DOUBLE JUMP
  • Hold SPACE in midair to GLIDE
  • Earn SCORE by destroying the SHEEP OBSTACLES
  • Survive long and attain the HIGHEST of SCORES
Miscellaneous

Created in three days as a short demo for university students showcasing the visual scripting tool "PLAYMAKER". While the theme is a parody of sorts to the TV series "House of the Dragon".
